text:
Really loved Roman and Andrea's apartment - it was exactly as described and in a great location. I was in Austin for SXSW and could walk to everything within around 1.5-2 miles -- just far enough away for it to be peaceful. 

Roman recommended a great restaurant called Laundrette which was a five min walk away. Fresh towels, shampoo/conditioner and beers in the fridge - better than being in a hotel. If I'm back in Austin in the future, I'll definitely stay here.
title: Private Studio in Modern Crash Pad
